DzDockAreaColumn Class Reference
[Interface Components]

Widget that makes up a column in a DzDockArea. More...

#include <dzdockarea.h>

Detailed Description

Widget that makes up a column in a DzDockArea.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzDockAreaColumn::DzDockAreaColumn ( DzDockArea *  parent,
DzLocation  location 
)

Creates a new Dock Area Column

Parameters:
parent The dock area that this column will belong to.
location The location of the dock area that this column will be in.
DzDockAreaColumn::~DzDockAreaColumn (  ) 

Destructor

Member Function Documentation

void DzDockAreaColumn::addWindow ( DzDockWindow *  window,
int  offset = -1 
)

Adds (docks) a window to the column.

Parameters:
window A pointer to the dock window to dock in this column.
offset The distance from the top of the column to dock the window.
int DzDockAreaColumn::depth (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The current depth of the column. This is the same as width() for Right and Left dock areas, or height() for Top and Bottom dock areas.
void DzDockAreaColumn::getDockPreview ( int  offset,
QPoint &  p1,
QPoint &  p2 
) const

For providing visual feedback. Sets p1 and p2 (in global screen coordinates) so a line between them shows where a dock would take place if a dock window was dropped at globalPos. If no dock would take place, p1 ad p2 are both set to (0, 0).

Parameters:
offset The distance from the top of the column that the dock would occur
p1 This point is set to the starting position of the preview in global coordinates
p2 This point is set to the ending position of the preview in global coordinates
int DzDockAreaColumn::getNumWindows (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The number of windows docked in this column
int DzDockAreaColumn::getPreferredDepth (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The preferred depth of the column.
DzDockWindow * DzDockAreaColumn::getWindow ( int  which  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
which The index of the window to return.
Returns:
The docked window at the given index
bool DzDockAreaColumn::isMinimized (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if this column is currently minimized
DzLocation DzDockAreaColumn::location (  )  const
Returns:
The location of the column.
void DzDockAreaColumn::minimize (  )  [slot]

Minimizes the column, if it is not already. The column shrinks so that only its resizing handle is visible.

int DzDockAreaColumn::minimumDepth (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The minimum depth of the column.
QSize DzDockAreaColumn::minimumSizeHint (  )  const [virtual]
Returns:
A size hint based on the depth of the column
void DzDockAreaColumn::normalize (  ) 

Normalizes the preferred lengths of the dock windows in this column

bool DzDockAreaColumn::removeWindow ( DzDockWindow *  window  ) 

Removes a window from the column

Parameters:
window A pointer to the dock window to be removed (undocked) from this area.
Returns:
true if the window was removed from the column, false if the window was not docked in the column.
void DzDockAreaColumn::restore (  )  [slot]

Restores the column to its previous depth if the column is currently minimized.

void DzDockAreaColumn::setPreferredDepth ( int  depth  )  [slot]

Set the depth of the column.

Parameters:
depth The new depth for the column. If depth is less the minimum depth, the column becomes the minimum depth.
QSize DzDockAreaColumn::sizeHint (  )  const [virtual]
Returns:
A size hint based on the depth of the column
void DzDockAreaColumn::toggleMinimized (  )  [slot]

Toggles whether this column is minimized - if minimized, the column restores itself, if full size the column becomes minimized.

void DzDockAreaColumn::updateMinDepth (  ) 

Updates the minimum depth for the column
